title: [Large-scale] Project Design Based on a Needs Hierarchy Model for Transitioning to Remote Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and no online learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners, as general citizens, are interested in social issues but lack experience with remote education tools. They propose solutions to community problems through project outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can clearly distinguish the three priority levels for remote education design using the Hierarchy of Needs Model.
Production of one or more digital learning content prototypes for solving community problems using the PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
Collaborative creation and presentation of an online lesson design plan within 3 hours in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
